channel.title: NPC's won't move?
channel.description:
I have this as my code:
X Y X1 Y1 X2 Y2 spawn = 101 3246 3434 0 0 3438 0 3430 2 Newbie Goblin spawn = 101 3246 3432 0 0 3436 0 3428 2 Newbie Goblin spawn = 101 3246 3436 0 0 3440 0 3432 2 Newbie Goblin spawn = 101 3246 3438 0 0 3442 0 3434 2 Newbie Goblin spawn = 101 3245 3439 0 0 3441 0 3437 2 Newbie Goblin spawn = 101 3245 3434 0 0 3436 0 3432 2 Newbie Goblin spawn = 101 3246 3432 0 0 3434 0 3430 2 Newbie Goblin spawn = 101 3248 3429 0 3250 0 3246 0 2 Newbie Goblin spawn = 101 3248 3438 0 3250 0 3246 0 2 Newbie Goblin
- I am trying to go by movements of 2. The first one for example can move up 2 and down 2 correct? They just stand there. I know I am obviously doing something wrong... Thanks for any help in advance.
*** Ah, I have figured it out. All I had to do was the change the two "0" that I left for the X1 and X2 spots to the normal X coordinate. ***

item.title: NPC's won't move?
item.dc:creator: @Wolfen_Sty Wolfen Sty
item.description:
@Wolfen_Sty wrote:

I have this as my code:

         X        Y                 X1      Y1      X2      Y2

spawn = 101 3246 3434 0 0 3438 0 3430 2 Newbie Goblin
spawn = 101 3246 3432 0 0 3436 0 3428 2 Newbie Goblin
spawn = 101 3246 3436 0 0 3440 0 3432 2 Newbie Goblin
spawn = 101 3246 3438 0 0 3442 0 3434 2 Newbie Goblin
spawn = 101 3245 3439 0 0 3441 0 3437 2 Newbie Goblin
spawn = 101 3245 3434 0 0 3436 0 3432 2 Newbie Goblin
spawn = 101 3246 3432 0 0 3434 0 3430 2 Newbie Goblin
spawn = 101 3248 3429 0 3250 0 3246 0 2 Newbie Goblin
spawn = 101 3248 3438 0 3250 0 3246 0 2 Newbie Goblin

  • I am trying to go by movements of 2. The first one for example can move up 2 and down 2 correct? They just stand there. I know I am obviously doing something wrong… Thanks for any help in advance.

*** Ah, I have figured it out. All I had to do was the change the two “0” that I left for the X1 and X2 spots to the normal X coordinate. ***
